sentences.english: What publications will be published during the Guangzhou Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运会赛时官方出版物计划有哪些？

sentences.english: What is the largest construction project of the 16th Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 第16届亚运会规模最大的建设项目是什么？

sentences.english: What's the start date of the Asian Gamess?
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运会的开幕日期是几月几日？

sentences.english: We must set up a propaganda for the Asian Games.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须为亚运会设立一个宣传机构。

sentences.english: I want to get a job at the Asian Gamess.
sentences.chinese: 我想在广州亚运会上找份工作。

sentences.english: At the 2006 Asian Games CHAN WAI-KEI won silver in the women's windsurfing competition.
sentences.chinese: 2006年亚运，陈慧琪赢得女子滑浪风帆竞赛银牌。

sentences.english: There is nothing to compare. And when we find incomparability, there is already half success," said Chen.
sentences.chinese: 找到了不可比性，就等于亚运会开幕式成功了一半。

sentences.english: An Asian Games decoration with its mascot is displayed in front of the media village in the Asian Games Town.
sentences.chinese: 亚运村媒体村前展示着一个亚运会的吉祥物装饰。

sentences.english: An Asian Games decoration with its mascot is displayed in front of the media village in the Asian Games Town.
sentences.chinese: 亚运村媒体村前展示着一个亚运会的吉祥物装饰。

sentences.english: The Asian Games take place every four years and involve athletes from all over Asia.
sentences.chinese: 亚运会每四年举行一次，汇集了来自亚洲的运动员。

sentences.english: The launching of the aircraft, but also sprayed with the English name of Guangzhou Asian Games.
sentences.chinese: 在飞机的发动上，还喷涂有广州亚运的英文名称。

sentences.english: How many components does the Guangzhou Asian Games City comprise?
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运城共由几部分组成？

sentences.english: My daughter would love to be a volunteer at the Asian Gamess.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿想当一名广州亚运会志愿者。

sentences.english: The Guangzhou Asian Games have received strong support from Asian governments and peoples.
sentences.chinese: 本届亚运会得到了亚洲各国政府和人民的大力支持。

sentences.english: The Asian Gamess will be good for business.
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运会的召开对促进商业发展有好处。

sentences.english: How many non-Olympic events will be held in the Guangzhou Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运会比赛项目中有多少个非奥运项目？

definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
abbr. for 城市運動會|城市运动会[Cheng2 shi4 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
World Exposition/abbr. for 世界博覽會|世界博览会[Shi4 jie4 Bo2 lan3 hui4], World Expo
Paralympics/same as Paralympic Games 殘奧會|残奥会[Can2 Ao4 hui4]
(International or national) Olympic Committee (abbr. for 奧林匹克委員會|奥林匹克委员会)/Olympic Games (abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会)
